discourse_list.title: CAIP-24: A proposal for protocol-agnostic provider

content.content: I’m sure we’re all thinking about how dapps will connect to wallets in a multi-network world, so let’s have that conversation. I’ve written an initial draft on the CAIPs repo as CAIP-24. It’s a very simple starting point, but is very extensible, and I think should be fairly straightforward to adapt to and from other JSON-RPC based approaches.   github.com/ChainAgnostic/CAIPs         Add chain-agnostic RPC   ChainAgnostic:master ← danfinlay:ChainAgnosticRpc            opened 04:26PM - 13 Oct 20 UTC               danfinlay             +84 -0

Thanks @danfinlay. Reading through this I also found CAIP-25 and totally rabbit holed into that which is super cool as well and seems to solve: https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-extension/issues/1820 ?!
